subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Ryan Briscoe got past his Penske teammate Will Power out of a caution pit stop on the 65th of 85 laps and held him off at the GoPro Indy Grand Prix in Sonoma, Calif.
snippet: Ryan Briscoe got past his Penske teammate Will Power out of a caution pit stop on the 65th of 85 laps and held him off at the GoPro Indy Grand Prix in Sonoma, Calif.
